snippet: The swirling column of wind and water lasted only minutes, according to witnesses, but damaged homes and power lines as it cut through the Rockaways, near Breezy Point.
abstract: Tornado rips through a beach club in Breezy Point, Queens, one of several outbursts of severe weather across the New York City region; second tornado touches down in Canarsie, Brooklyn; there are no reports of injuries.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and CHRISTOPHER MAAG
byline.contributor: Colin Moynihan, Michael Schwirtz and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The swirling column of wind and water lasted only minutes, according to witnesses, but damaged homes and power lines as it cut through the Rockaways, near Breezy Point.

headline.main: Tornadoes Touch Down in Brooklyn and Queens
headline.print_headline: Tornadoes Touch Down In Brooklyn And Queens
